scenario_text.value: What the hell... What the hell, man...
Kewww...
What’s wrong, Ryo? Did something happen?
He seems pretty scared, doesn’t he?
Unnngh...
A ghost... I saw a freaking ghost...

(A ghost? Does he mean that thing we saw by
the stairs a little while ago?)
Was it a boy ghost?
Must be a girl ghost.

Yeah, I saw it too. Still, we don’t know if
it’s really a ghost yet.

Of course that thing’s a friggin’ ghost.
That girl wasn’t among the living...
Huh? A girl? But the one I saw was a boy...

You’re kidding me... We gotta deal with a
buncha spooks on top of that monster?!
Yeah, I saw it, too. I think it was a girl...

Yeah, that’s the one! She just popped out out
of nowhere! No living human can do that!

What’d I do to deserve this, dammit? That’s
it, I’m not moving from this spot...
Yeeeeeek!
Aaahhh-hunnNNNngh...
Kew! Kewkew!
What’s that sound? It’s kinda nice!

It’s a piano! Is it coming from the music
room?

I wanna go check it out, but...Ryo’s gone and
passed out. Is it okay to leave him here?
Kewww!
Kunemon says he’ll look after him.

Cool, he’s all yours, then. Let’s go to the
<color=#B41919>music room</color>, Agumon!
Yeah!
